events.eventSynopsis: From the midnight pit stops to the sunrise battles, Matt Miller and Hannah Elliott take you into drivers seat with CEOs, racing legends and the brands competing for the Le Mans edge.
events.epgEventTitle: Hot Pursuit! 24 Hours of Le Mans

events.eventSynopsis: This special Bloomberg programme brings together some of the world's most influential thinkers, policy makers and business leaders to tackle the major issues facing the world.
Exploring every angle of climate change, technology, finance, sports and beyond, Bloomberg Originals is business as you've never seen it.
Pascal Desroches, AT&T - AT&T CFO Pascal Desroches has partnered with CEO John Stankey to restructure the company around a core of fibre and 5G wireless connectivity.
Salesforce's Marc Benioff - Emily meets Salesforce Co-Founder & CEO Marc Benioff to discuss the rise of AI agents and what it's like to run a very meme-able global tech company.

How Flying Cars Became a Billion-Dollar Bet - Flying cars have largely remained science fiction, until now. A new generation of electrified aircraft is attracting the attention of investors and venture capitalists around the world.

Is the Moon the Future of the Space Economy? - Governments and entrepreneurs are racing to commercialize the moon. These efforts could unlock a new, deep-space economy. But to return and stay will require the highest levels of innovation.
Neuro-Insight - We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of Neuro-Insight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.
Monkey Laundering - How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.
Scambaiters - Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.
A monthly deep dive into Africa's biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africa's quest of bridging the gap with global powers.
Leaders from across tech and business discuss how to navigate today's hazards and create opportunities. Guests include Google's Sundar Pichai, Meta's Andrew Bosworth, and Uber's Dara Khosrowshahi.

Principles With Bill Belichick and Ray Dalio - The hosts sit for a special conversation with two titans, football coach Bill Belichick and Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, to learn their guiding principles for success.
